name: Super Sunny Island
storyline:
Sunny is a penguin who loves the nature! But where Sunny lives there is only snow everywhere, and there is not even a single flower to smell... One day Sunny, discovered a new island full of life and greeny things! So Sunny decide to go there, but there is also some bad pirates traveling there... They are building a robot army and are planning to explore that richful island. By lucky, Sunny also is bringing a watergun, which will come pretty handy, not only for watering some flowers.

Travel through 5 different scenarios exploring the levels the order you prefer on which world! Unlock and defeat each area pirate boss to unlock some pretty useful powerups and the next scenary! Recharge your watergun and help Sunny to overcome all obstacles and save that peaceful and beautiful new island!
summary: A summer themed retro style 2D platformer, where you play as "Sunny", an adorable and adventurous penguin with a watergun!
